DialogueText:
Wait forget the errands... you're still a BEGINNER???
MAIN QUEST:Select a new class from Promotheus. He's in the Bean map after Frogs!

Wait... you're still a BEGINNER???
MAIN QUEST:Select a new class from Promotheus. He's in the Bean map after Frogs!

But you've come a long way since that epic fall from gamer grace so why don't you go check it out for yourself? Come back when you know more about the place!
MAIN QUEST:Reach the Boss Room located in the Forest Camp past the Carrotmen and Glublin maps!
You've come a long way since that epic fall from grace. I think it's time you FIGHT THE WORLD BOSS! MAIN QUEST:Reach the Boss Room. It's a long way from home...

I'll add a Hint to your codex if you want more info. Now go spend those points!
MAIN QUEST:Spend 5 Talent Points

You get 3 talent points every time you level up... Now go spend those points!
MAIN QUEST:Spend 5 Talent Points

Now lets find you some tougher monsters!
MAIN QUEST:Defeat Green Mushrooms and reach the next map!

Now lets find you some tougher monsters!
MAIN QUEST:Defeat Green Mushrooms and reach the next map! Teleport back here using the MAP button after!

You ever played that choppin' minigame? Everyone around here loooves that game you'd get mad respect from having a siiiick score to brag about!
QUEST:Get a score of 35 in the Choppin Minigame.

You ever played that choppin' minigame? Everyone around here loooves that game you'd get mad respect from having a siiiick score to brag about!
QUEST:Get a score of 20 in the Choppin Minigame.

But uh you gooootta hook us up with some food bro it's common mushroom manners! Bring it here and we'll carry it to the party with this novelty food bag I bought online when I was... hehehe well never mind!
QUEST:Be the food hookup

Get some food and I'll increase your food carry capacity!
QUEST:Get nomwiches pizza and that GLIZZY bro!

Buuuuut it's still not time to go yet. Trust me you do NOT wanna be the first one to this party... but a kiiiiiller like you already knew that for sure!
QUEST:Wait until the party starts.

We gotta waiiit for the party to start!
QUEST:Collect clocks by defeating jungle monsters!

See how your tree over there is a tree and mine here is... well not a tree anymore? Please make yours a bit more like mine.
QUEST:Collect 100 Oak Logs.

See how your tree over there is a tree and mine here is... well not a tree anymore? Please make yours a bit more like mine.
QUEST:Collect 30 Oak Logs.

Care to give it a try? I'd do it myself but I wouldn't want to embarass a beginner like you!
QUEST:Collect 10 Oak Logs!

Care to give it a try? I'd do it myself but I wouldn't want to embarass a beginner like you!
QUEST:Collect 3 Oak Logs!

Actually before you take off can ya get me some exotic logs? There's a 1 in a billion chance of getting one from this tree!
QUEST: Get a Forest Log from a different tree found at the end of the world.

Actually before you take off can ya get me some exotic logs? There's a 1 in a billion chance of getting one from this tree!
QUEST: I think he might be trolling the log he wants is found somewhere else...
Figure oOOoout hoOOow I died and I'll give yoOOOoou a key sOooo yoOooo can gooOooo behind that doooOOOor! QUEST:Defeat Board Monsters below until you find the 3 Bones then return

Figure oOOoout hoOOow I died and I'll give yoOOOoou a key sOooo yoOooo can gooOooo behind that doooOOOor!
QUEST:Defeat Board Monsters below until you find the 3 Bones then return

... meow... Zzz...
QUEST:Find something to scare the cat off the Obol Altar

... meow... Zzz...
QUEST:Find something to scare the cat off the Obol Altar. Maybe from the Town Shop?

Why don't you go 'ask' the frogs around here for some Condiments? Those FISTS of yours seem persuasive hehe!!
QUEST:Kill frogs for condiments! USE your blue time candy to speed it up!

Why don't you go 'ask' the frogs around here if they've seen my condiments.
QUEST:Kill frogs for condiments!

Well come on now I aint gonna give you part of my stash here for nothin'. This is a picnic basket not a charity house! Bring me something and maybe we can fix up a deal...
QUEST:Bring a Nomwich buy them from the Shop in town.

Besides you don't even have any clothes... weirdo...
QUEST:Craft the Orange Shirt at the Anvil and bring it here unequipped. You can equip it after

One... two... THREE!!! Oh and these monsters have Increased Damage watch out!
QUEST:Kill the green mushrooms! If you fail forfeit the quest using the Codex and retry!

One... two... THREE!!!
QUEST:Kill the mushrooms! If you fail forfeit the quest using the Codex and retry!
